title: 3 Ways to Grow Your Passion Even With a Full Time Job
description: How many of us are scared of leaving our current jobs even though we know we're not living up to our full potential?Maybe because of the money, security, or prestige?In this episode, I'll give you step by step tips on how you can grow your passion even with a full-time job.
author: onpurposepodcast@jayshetty.me (Jay Shetty)
content:encoded: How many of us are scared of leaving our current jobs even though we know we're not living up to our full potential?Maybe because of the money, security, or prestige?In this episode, I'll give you step by step tips on how you can grow your passion even with a full-time job.
